body: Nutting to something you nutted to 7 years ago is somewhat of a...surreal experience
Dear fucking God this idiot totally deserved it
The wife is cute and sexy, but at the same time so stupid (along with the whole plot) that borders to pure dementia.
This shit who's dumb enough not to relies that their cheating damn she dumb fuck this it's so unrealistic it's sad
thats why this is the nightmares tag

No matter how many times I see plots like these it never ceases to amaze me... the blur line here is that she is so stupid that she doesn't feel like she's actually cheating on him. She truly thinks that she's doing out it of love for him, that she is doing nothing wrong, and that she's not hurting or betraying him. *Facepalm* Maybe in a part 2 that will never be release, she will completely break and turn it into 100% NTR.
